name: Kinfolk (contemporary)

visual_treatment.color_palette: Muted earth tones, warm beiges, soft whites, dusty pastels, and desaturated naturals with occasional pops of sage green or terracotta
visual_treatment.lighting: Abundant soft natural light, golden hour warmth, diffused window light, minimal artificial lighting with emphasis on organic shadows
visual_treatment.contrast: Low to medium contrast with lifted shadows, gentle highlights, and compressed tonal range for dreamy, ethereal quality
visual_treatment.texture: Clean, minimal grain structure, sharp but not clinical detail, emphasis on tactile surfaces like linen, wood, and natural materials

composition.framing: Generous negative space, asymmetrical balance, subjects often positioned in rule-of-thirds intersections with breathing room
composition.spatial_relationships: Minimalist arrangements with intentional gaps between elements, creating sense of calm and contemplation
composition.perspectives: Eye-level and slightly elevated angles, intimate close-ups balanced with environmental context shots
composition.layout_philosophy: Less-is-more aesthetic with emphasis on white space, clean lines, and uncluttered visual hierarchy

technical.film_or_technology: High-end digital cameras with medium format aesthetic, occasional film photography with fine-grain stocks
technical.lens_character: Clean, clinical lens rendering with subtle vignetting, shallow depth of field for selective focus
technical.post_processing: Subtle color grading with lifted blacks, warm highlights, desaturated color channels, and film emulation

cultural_context.values: Mindful consumption, authentic relationships, craftsmanship, sustainability, and intentional living
cultural_context.subject_matter: Intimate gatherings, artisanal crafts, natural landscapes, simple home interiors, seasonal cooking, and quiet human moments
cultural_context.target_audience: Design-conscious millennials and Gen X seeking authentic lifestyle inspiration and slower pace
cultural_context.era_signature: Reaction against digital overwhelm through visual restraint and celebration of analog experiences

temporal_markers: Hygge and lagom lifestyle philosophy visualization
distinguishing_features: Aspirational yet attainable lifestyle imagery with editorial restraint, celebrating imperfection and authentic human connection through meticulously crafted 'unstaged' moments
